name: Dynath-AIR-eum, by Jeed
author: Jadehex
notes:
Ok, so let's get this out of the way first, this deck is NOT poised for the meta at all.
It's roughly 50-50 across the board depending on skill except for the Sylvan Lottery (hence the heavy tech)

The original idea was from @Yehhey - 6th NA, I took the core of Rhynos + Mirror and ran with it.
I think the Pegasus + Paralel Twister Core is Probably better cuz you have a more generic out to sylvans, but I had no twisters.
Outside of the Bastion core of Use 3x Cyclone + 2x Mirror to reliably activate skill:
The strategy is Using Rhynos + Mirror as a resource saving response to destruction.

Mirror Wall in general is a really solid call RN, people dont prep for it as much and it HARD punishes the Anki Loop.

End of the Day It's a fun deck, I play to have fun, rough meta for fun decks.

Back to farming

Also 3 Down, Im gonna have a FUN time in may getting Firm as Earth to work in a Sylvan Meta
